creator: srinivasarao.ammina@tcs.com
text:
Hi 

FIRST OF ALL THIS IS NOT A BUG AND WE NEED A HELP FOR THE BELOW SITUATION.

We are having a requirement where the business is shared the business excel sheets which contains some links through which one excel file is linked to another excel file and gettting values from multiple excel sheets in one consolidated excel sheet. Here the issue is the refering file names are not always the same hence we are having a requirement where we need to dynamically change the source of the links in consolidated excel sheet. We did not find any POI API methods to change the source od the links

Could you please guide us how to handle this kind of situations.

Thanks
Srinivasa Rao Ammina

creator: apache@gagravarr.org
text: Please ask questions on the user list - http://poi.apache.org/mailinglists.html - bugzilla is for bugs and patches
